meanings.definition: To engage in physical combat or struggle
meanings.sent1: He fights bravely in the ring.
meanings.sent2: She fights with her brother over toys.
meanings.sent3: The cat fights playfully with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The waves and the shore constantly fights for dominance.
meanings.sent5: The hero fights against the evil dragon to save the kingdom.

meanings.definition: A physical confrontation between two or more individuals
meanings.sent1: The two boys had a fight after school.
meanings.sent2: The fight broke out at the bar last night.
meanings.sent3: The fight between the siblings ended with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The fight for the last cookie was intense.
meanings.sent5: The epic fight scene in the movie had everyone on the edge of their seats.

meanings.definition: To contend or strive against something
meanings.sent1: She fights against injustice wherever she sees it.
meanings.sent2: The team fights hard to win every game.
meanings.sent3: The little engine fights to climb the steep hill.
meanings.sent4: The sun fights through the clouds to shine on the field.
meanings.sent5: He fights against his fear of heights to climb the mountain.

meanings.definition: A battle or conflict between opposing forces
meanings.sent1: The fight between good and evil is a timeless theme.
meanings.sent2: The political fight for power continues in the capital.
meanings.sent3: The fight between the seasons creates beautiful changes.
meanings.sent4: The fight between the rival gangs escalated quickly.
meanings.sent5: The fight for freedom united the people in a common cause.
